item.title: First script (auto login)
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

yeah srl does do it for you e.x.

program login;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
procedure DeclarePlayers;
 Begin                         {dont touch this!}
    HowManyPlayers := 1;
    NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);    // Sets the Players Array Length;
    CurrentPlayer := 0;                 // CurrentPlayer = Array Index
                             {just touch this!}
    Players[0].Name := '';        //Username
    Players[0].Pass := '';           //Password
    Players[0].Nick := '';             //3 or 4 letters username
    Players[0].Loc := '';                  //Dont touch this
    Players[0].Active := True;
end;

procedure login;
begin
Loginplayer;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Login;
end.

must have latest version of srl

item.title: First script (auto login)
item.dc:creator: @t3hl33tn00b t3hl33tn00b
item.description:
@t3hl33tn00b wrote:

ok guys this is my first day actually using scar so dont expect it to be awsome >_>

program AutoLogin;
const
username='';//type your username here inside the ' '
password='';//type your password here inside the ' '

var
x, y, ExistingUser, LoginButton, ClickToPlayButton: Integer;

procedure ClickExistingUser;
begin
 If(FindDTM(ExistingUser,x,y,0,0,765,501))Then
    Writeln('ok found the existing user button..')
    wait(500+random(40));
    MoveMouse(x,y);
    wait(1000+random(34));
    ClickMouse(x,y,true);
 end;
 
Procedure TypeNames;
begin
  SendKeys(username+chr(13));
  Wait(1001+random(20));
  SendKeys(password);
end;

Procedure ClickLogin;
begin
  If(FindDTM(LoginButton,x,y,0,0,765,501)) Then
  Writeln('found the login button');
  Wait(400);
  MoveMouse(x,y);
  ClickMouse(x,y,true);
end;
Procedure ClickToPlay;
begin
 If(FindDTM(ClickToPlayButton,x,y,0,0,765,501))Then
 Writeln('found the click to play button')
 wait(1000+random(50));
 MoveMouse(x,y);
 wait(1000+random(30));
 HoldMouse(x,y,true);
 wait(200+random(20));
 ReleaseMouse(x,y,true);
end;
begin
  ExistingUser := DTMFromString('78DA637464646058C480028C8CADC1342394C' +
       'FC80F6495A1AAF9FF9F0155CD4620B1005DCD7F5435C719089B13' +
       '0764CDC76F0E00DBF20F97');
  LoginButton := DTMFromString('78DA634C62606098C88002FEFFFF0FA619A17' +
       'CC665406212AA1A6111515435F5404217DD1C0654359381441DAA' +
       '1A1959051435004ACE0981');
  ClickToPlayButton := DTMFromString('78DA639CCEC0C0A0CF8002FEFFFF0FA619A17' +
       'C4657206182AAC6C8880D558D1690504655A36F6A80AAC61148F8' +
       'A1AAF9F97B2DAA9A3B404208558D0713038A1A0002F409FA');
  ActivateClient;
  ClearDebug;
  ClickExistingUser;
  wait(500)
  TypeNames;
  wait(500)
  ClickLogin;
  wait(1000+random(230));
  ClickToPlay;
end.

i have two requests
1.) please tell me which procedures are detected (dont tell me there are none cuz i know there are lol )
and
2.) i was trying to make an "if…then…else statement so that if you weren’t at the login screen, it would stop running. someone wanna help me a bit with that?

Read full topic
